definition: prefix used before the surname of a person or a numeral indicating the order of birth of the children in a family or to indicate affection or familiarity/old (of people)/venerable (person)/experienced/of long standing/always/all the time/of the past/very/outdated/(of meat etc) tough

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: So, upon finishing her exams, she fled home, thinking everything would be just as it used to be.
sentences.chinese: 于是，她一考完试就奔回家中，自以为一切老样子。

sentences.english: Oh, the same old same-old, you tell her.
sentences.chinese: 噢，还是老样子，你告诉她。

sentences.english: At present, many of the institutions exist, but people remain much the same as they were.
sentences.chinese: 如今，很多体制都已经存在了，而人们仍然是老样子。

sentences.english: She looked the same as always, and fortunately the rain had not caused a chill.
sentences.chinese: 她看上去是老样子，幸运的是，那雨没有使她受凉。

sentences.english: After that, it’s back to the old, negative thought patterns.
sentences.chinese: 然后，又回到老样子，消极的思想模式。

sentences.english: The bedroom was exactly the same.
He was exactly what he had been when I knew him in Hertfordshire;
sentences.chinese: 他完全还是上次我在哈福德郡见到他时的那副老样子。

sentences.english: Nobody liked it, and this year, they changed it back.
sentences.chinese: 没人喜欢弄成这样，于是今年，又都变回了老样子。

sentences.english: The mountain village is no longer what it used to be.
sentences.chinese: 这个山村不再是以前的老样子了。

sentences.english: Jade: Oh, you know, the usual, teaching aerobics, partying way too much.
sentences.chinese: 老样子，教操，还有太多的聚会。

definition: back to where we were (idiom); absolutely no improvement/Things haven't changed at all.
same as 一樣|一样[yi1 yang4]/the same
just as in the past (idiom); as before/continuing as always
dispirited and downcast (idiom); listless/in low spirits/washed out
same place as before/usual place/stomping ground
listless/dispirited/washed out/also written 沒精打彩|没精打彩
